Runesmith:BrokenRuby.NAME: Broken Ruby
Runesmith:BrokenRuby.FLAVOR: A crystal that resembles a red gem. Although it is broken, faint energy still remains.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b2 #yrunesmith:Ignis. If you played at least #b2 #yAttacks last turn, #yEnhance a random card in your hand.

Runesmith:MiniCore.NAME: Minicore
Runesmith:MiniCore.FLAVOR: This peculiar orb was once used as an energy storage.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 #yrunesmith:Potency at the start of the combat.

Runesmith:Nanobots.NAME: Nanobots
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, #yrunesmith:Enhance all cards in your hand.

Runesmith:UraniumAnvil.NAME: Uranium Anvil
Runesmith:UraniumAnvil.FLAVOR: This block of metal holds massive amount of energy but weakens anyone who come near it.
DESCRIPTIONS: at the start of your turn. #yrunesmith:Downgrade a random card in your draw pile, hand, or discard pile each turn.

Runesmith:Locket.NAME: Locket
Runesmith:Locket.FLAVOR: An image of unknown yet familiar figure resides within.
DESCRIPTIONS: One time each combat, if your health drops below #b15%, add Last Stand to the top of your draw pile.

Runesmith:AutoHammer.NAME: AutoHammer
Runesmith:AutoHammer.FLAVOR: An automatic hammer which never stops hammering.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play #b3 skills in #b1 turn, #yrunesmith:Enhance a random card in your hand.

Runesmith:EmergencyProvisions.NAME: Emergency Provisions
Runesmith:EmergencyProvisions.FLAVOR: A self-contained, individual field ration in lightweight packaging.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play a Craft card, gain #b1 random #yrunesmith:Element.

Runesmith:PocketReactor.NAME: Pocket Reactor
DESCRIPTIONS: #yrunesmith:Elements are no longer used for crafting. All cards lose #b2 #yrunesmith:Potency.

Runesmith:CoreCrystal.NAME: Core Crystal
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #rBroken #rRuby. All #yrunesmith:Element gains increased by #b50%. Raises maximum #yrunesmith:Elements to #b20.
